sentence.Network_en: Maidan, then seventeen, was sold, taken to England and put to steeple chase racing.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦登在十七岁时就被卖掉了, 后被带到英国参加越野赛跑.

sentence.Network_en: Of all Arabians, one of the most durable must have been the stallion called Maidan.
sentence.Network_cn: 在所有的阿拉伯马中, 耐力最好的恐怕要数一匹名叫麦登的种马了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... maid-in-waiting 宫女 maidan 练兵场 maiden 少女.
马坦公园（maidan）（Maidan）是加尔各答最大的城市公园。这里有许多露天运动场，如著名的板球场地伊甸园，世界最古老的赛马俱乐部之一  …
广场用英语怎样说_百度知道 ... piazza. 露天市场，广场 maidan 操场，（印）练兵场 square (方形)广场，街心广场.

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Urdu and Persian maidān, from Arabic maydān

auth_sentence.content: You don't get real crowds until you reach the Maidan.
auth_sentence.res_content: You don't get real crowds until you reach the Maidan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You don't get real crowds until you reach the Maidan.

auth_sentence.content: India is cricket and vice-versa, and its soul is to be found on the Maidan.
auth_sentence.res_content: India is cricket and vice-versa, and its soul is to be found on the Maidan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: India is cricket and vice-versa, and its soul is to be found on the Maidan.

auth_sentence.content: Five minutes on the Maidan tell you that nothing could be further from the truth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Five minutes on the Maidan tell you that nothing could be further from the truth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Five minutes on the Maidan tell you that nothing could be further from the truth.
